product_name: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles - 20 oz. Can
long_description: Enjoy tender beef chunks with noodles and mushrooms in a rich sour-cream sauce with the Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles freeze-dried meal. Easy to prepare-just add hot water. Includes ten 1-cup servings. Can of Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles has a 25-year shelf life. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._.
short_description: Enjoy tender beef chunks with noodles and mushrooms in a rich sour-cream sauce with the Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles freeze-dried meal.
